content_security_policy.sandbox: sandbox allow-scripts allow-modals allow-popups; script-src-elem 'self' 'unsafe-inline' blob: http://* https://*; style-src-elem 'self' 'unsafe-inline' blob: http://* https://*; img-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' blob: http://* https://*; font-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' blob: http://* https://*; connect-src http://* https://*.hyperbeam.com wss://*.hyperbeam.com; media-src *
